content.rendered:
As the end of the 2024-2025 academic year approaches, the district has finalized the end-of-year calendar. The last day of school for elementary and middle school students will be a half-day on Wednesday, June 25.  Additionally, because the district used only two emergency weather days this year, there will be no school on Friday, June 6.  Please note the following dates:

Elementary End of Academic Year Dates

  • May 26: Memorial Day – No School 
  • June 2:  Elementary Teacher Planning Half Day
  • June 6: Emergency Give Back Day – No School
  • June 19: Juneteenth – No School
  • June 25: Last day of classes for elementary school students (half-day of school)

Middle School End of Academic Year Dates

  • May 26: Memorial Day – No School 
  • June 6: Emergency Give Back Day – No School
  • June 19: Juneteenth – No School
  • June 25: Last day of classes for middle school students (half-day of school)

High School End of Academic Year Dates

  • May 23: Regular day of school for SSHS students but there are no scheduled programs at the WSWHE BOCES Myers Education Center
  • May 26: Memorial Day – No School 
  • June 6: Emergency Give Back Day – No School
  • June 10: Biology Regents and Earth & Space Science Regents Exams  – No school for students except for those taking the exam
  • June 11: Geometry Regents Exam  – No school for students except for those taking the exam
  • June 16: Last day of regular instruction for high school students (full day of school)
  • June 17 – June 25: Regents Exams – No school for students except for those who are taking exams
  • June 19: Juneteenth – No School
  • June 27: Graduation Day
